story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Giratina, calm down! Get back in your
Poké Ball!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_0200_10: You! What have you done to Giratina?!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I’ve learned how to use sync stones to
force Pokémon to obey me!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Arceus WILL be under my control!
And I WILL create a better world!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_0700_10: Even if I have to destroy this one!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_0800_10:
And to make it happen, Giratina shall
once again be MY fangs to brandish!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_0900_10: I can’t let you do that!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You’re finally showing your true colors,
Volo!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_1600_10: Is this some kind of performance?
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I know you’ve been on my tail the past
few days!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_1800_10:
So I had to act before you took away
my options!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I’ll give you another chance at revenge
on the deity you loathe, who banished
you to the other side of our world!
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Remember! Remember your hate for
Arceus...
story_arceus_06_08000/2401_1001_2300_10: with the shine of this sync stone!
